GSD.description:
virtio_console: eliminate anonymous module_init & module_exit

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.276 by commit 7deaddb704713608e0ae559e27185581b9af71a0. For more details please see the references link.
